name: Don't burn your Asshole
description:
DON'T BURN YOUR ASSHOLE

Is a surreal horror game, where your main goal is to perform a coffee enema without burning your asshole. This is a html5 Unity web game.

This is an all typing game. To begin, type “play” and press ENTER. Type instructions such as “turn on stove” to perform different tasks.

If you’re stuck, make sure to check your to do list by hovering over the sticky note image
